description: This file defines a Qwik component for the notes list page in a note-taking web application. It manages loading notes, filtering them based on user input, and rendering the main layout including header, sidebar, and note list. It also specifies document head metadata.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main functional component that renders the notes list page.

methods.name: useTask$
methods.description: Hook that runs an effect upon component initialization to load notes.
Decorator used to mark a function as a Qwik closure for handling events or lazy execution.

methods.name: useSignal
methods.description: Creates a reactive signal to manage the search query input.
